Action.Name: Index
Action.Title: 列表

Command.Name: 列表页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command: <IndexPageActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html"> <Page SettingType="IndexPage"> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="toolbar-panel" PageID="P01101"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-search" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-search',plain:true" Title="检索" ActionValue="2" Action="showActDlg('检索','/Page/P01101/Search',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-detail" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-detail',plain:true" Title="查看" ActionValue="4" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid','查看','/Page/P01101/Detail',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-create" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-add',plain:true" Title="新增" ActionValue="8" Action="showActDlg('新增','/Page/P01101/Create',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-edit" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-edit',plain:true" Title="修改" ActionValue="16" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid','修改','/Page/P01101/Edit',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-delete" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolmultiple normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel',plain:true" Title="删除" ActionValue="32" Action="showActDlg_DGItemsConfirm('datagrid','删除','确认删除选择项？','/Page/P01101/Delete',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-copy" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-att',plain:true" Title="复制" ActionValue="256" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid','复制','/Page/P01101/Copy',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-import" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-import',plain:true" Title="导入" ActionValue="64" Action="showActDlg('导入','/Page/P01101/Import',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-export" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-export',plain:true" Title="导出" ActionValue="128" Action="showActDlg('导出','/Page/P01101/Export',400,300)" /> <UIButton /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> <DataGrid Tag="table" ID="datagrid" Class="easyui-datagrid" Options="url:'/Page/P01101/Query',fit:true,pagination: true,rownumbers: true,nowrap: true,striped: true,collapsible: false,resizable:true,onClickRow:oncheckstate,onSelect:oncheckstate,onCheck:oncheckstate,onCheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheck:oncheckstate,onUnselect:oncheckstate" Key="AssetID"> <Column Title="编号" FieldName="AssetID" ColumnWidth="29" IsCheckBox="true" /> <Column Title="资产名称" FieldName="AssetName" /> <Column Title="资产类别" FieldName="Category" /> <Column Title="条码编号" FieldName="BarCard" ColumnWidth="100" /> <Column Title="规格型号" FieldName="SpecificationsModel" /> <Column HAlign="Center" Title="单位" FieldName="UnitName" ColumnWidth="38" /> <Column HAlign="Center" Title="增加方式" FieldName="AddType" ColumnWidth="62" /> <Column Title="所属公司" FieldName="CName" /> <Column Title="使用部门" FieldName="DName" /> <Column Title="使用员工" FieldName="EName" ColumnWidth="62" /> <Column Title="仓库名称" FieldName="WHName" /> <Column Options="hidden:true" HAlign="Center" Title="储位编号" FieldName="LOCNO" ColumnWidth="62" /> <Column HAlign="Right" Title="购入价格" FieldName="Price" ColumnWidth="62" /> <Column HAlign="Center" Title="购置时间" FieldName="BuyDate" ColumnWidth="76" /> <Column Title="供应商" FieldName="SupplierName" /> <Column Title="质保说明" FieldName="QualityDescription" /> <Column HAlign="Right" Title="使用年限" FieldName="UseYear" ColumnWidth="62" /> <Column HAlign="Center" Title="使用情况" FieldName="UseCondition" ColumnWidth="70" /> <Column Options="hidden:true" HAlign="Center" Title="折旧方法" FieldName="Depreciation" ColumnWidth="90" /> <Column Options="hidden:true" HAlign="Right" Title="月折旧率" FieldName="Monatsquote" ColumnWidth="62" /> <Column Options="hidden:true" HAlign="Right" Title="月折旧额" FieldName="MonthDepreciation" ColumnWidth="62" /> <Column Options="hidden:true" HAlign="Right" Title="累计折旧" FieldName="AccumulatedDepreciation" ColumnWidth="62" /> <Column Options="hidden:true" HAlign="Right" Title="净值" FieldName="NetAsset" ColumnWidth="62" /> <Column Options="hidden:true" HAlign="Center" Title="报废类型" FieldName="ScrapType" ColumnWidth="62" /> <Column Options="hidden:true" HAlign="Center" Title="维修类型" FieldName="RepairType" ColumnWidth="62" /> <Column Options="hidden:true" Title="状态" FieldName="Status" ColumnWidth="62" /> <Column Title="备注" FieldName="Remark" /> </DataGrid> </Page> </IndexPageActionCommand>

Action.Name: Search
Action.Title: 检索

Command.Name: 检索页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command:
<EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html"> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog" EditPanelClass="edit-panel-w2"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="条码编号" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="BarCard" Class="easyui-textbox edit-input" Binding="BarCard" IsRequired="false" Length="20" /> </Field> <Field Title="资产名称" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="AssetName" Class="easyui-textbox edit-input" Binding="AssetName" IsRequired="false" Length="50" /> </Field> <Field Title="资产类别" FieldType="ComboTree"> <ComboTree Tag="input" Name="CategoryID" Class="edit-input easyui-combotree" Binding="CategoryID" IsRequired="false" Length="6" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=CategoryTreeForQuery&resultformat=jsontree&root=000000&pid=PID&id=ID&text=Name" DisplayMember="text" ValueMember="id" IsAutoHeight="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="增加方式" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="AddType" Class="easyui-combobox edit-input" Options="editable:false" Binding="AddType" IsRequired="false" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="Code" DataUrl="/Share/GetSystemCodes?code=C074" /> </Field> <Field Title="所属公司" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="CompanyID" Class="edit-input easyui-combobox" Options="editable:false" Binding="CompanyID" IsRequired="false" Length="8" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="ID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetAllAreaCode" IsAutoHeight="false" OnSelect="function(rec){
var url='/Share/Query?name=GetDeptTreeByCompanyID&resultformat=jsontree&root='+rec.ID+'&pid=PID&id=ID&text=Name&CompanyID='+rec.ID;
var url1='/Share/Query?name=GetEmpByDeptAndJob&JobID=xxxxxx&DeptID=xxxxxx';
var url2='/Share/Query?name=GetWHByCompany&CompanyID='+rec.ID
$('#EmployeeID').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Department').combotree({url:url});
$('#EmployeeID').combobox({url:url1});
$('#WhCd').combobox({url:url2});
}" /> </Field> <Field Title="仓库名称" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" ID="WhCd" Name="WhCd" Class="easyui-combobox edit-input" Options="editable:false" Binding="WhCd" IsRequired="false" Length="4" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="ID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetWHByCompany&CompanyID=XXXXXX" IsAutoHeight="false" OnSelect="function(rec){
var url='/Share/Query?name=GetLocByWH&WhCd='+rec.ID;
$('#LOCNO').combobox({url:url});
}" /> </Field> <Field Title="使用部门" FieldType="ComboTree"> <ComboTree Tag="input" ID="Department" Name="DeptID" Class="edit-input easyui-combotree" Binding="DeptID" IsRequired="false" Length="8" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetDeptTreeByCompanyID&resultformat=jsontree&root=000000&pid=PID&id=ID&text=Name&CompanyID=xxxxxx" DisplayMember="text" ValueMember="id" IsAutoHeight="false" OnSelect="function(rec){
var url='/Share/Query?name=GetEmpByDeptAndJob&JobID=&DeptID='+rec.id;
$('#EmployeeID').combobox({url:url});
}" /> </Field> <Field Title="使用情况" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="UseCondition" Class="easyui-combobox edit-input" Options="editable:false" Binding="UseCondition" IsRequired="false" Length="10" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="Code" DataUrl="/Share/GetSystemCodes?code=C075" /> </Field> <Field Title="使用员工" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" ID="EmployeeID" Name="EmployeeID" Class="edit-input easyui-combobox" Binding="EmployeeID" IsRequired="false" Length="8" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="ID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetEmpByDeptAndJob&DeptID=xxxxxx&JobID=xxxxxx" IsAutoHeight="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="供应商" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="SupplierID" Class="easyui-combobox edit-input" Binding="SupplierID" IsRequired="false" Length="8" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="ID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetAssetSupplier" /> </Field> <Field Title="购置时间" FieldType="DateBox"> <DateBox Tag="input" Name="BuyDateBegin" Class="easyui-datebox edit-input" Binding="BuyDateBegin" IsRequired="false" Length="100" /> </Field> <Field Title="至" FieldType="DateBox"> <DateBox Tag="input" Name="BuyDateEnd" Class="easyui-datebox edit-input" Binding="BuyDateEnd" IsRequired="false" Length="100" /> </Field> <Field Title="状态" FieldType="Hidden"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Status" Class="edit-input" InputType="hidden" Binding="Status" IsRequired="false" IsHidden="true" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01101"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-query" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-ok'" Title="确定" ActionValue="2" Action="submitAct_DGReplace('dataform','/Page/P01101/Query','datagrid')" /> <UIButton ID="btn-cancel" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="取消" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>

Action.Name: Query
Action.Title: 检索

Command.Name: 查询总数
Command.Description: 本查询的结果值为JSON，参数路径为Results[检索分页].Json

Action.Command: <ScalarCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="分页查询" GroupName="固定资产" TableName="zc_Asset" CommandName="QueryCount" SqlType="Scalar"> <Parameter Name="BuyDateBegin" Path="Request[BuyDateBegin]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="BuyDateEnd" Path="Request[BuyDateEnd]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="BarCard" Path="Request[BarCard]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="AssetName" Path="Request[AssetName]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="CategoryID" Path="Request[CategoryID]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="AddType" Path="Request[AddType]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="CompanyID" Path="Request[CompanyID]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="DeptID" Path="Request[DeptID]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="EmployeeID" Path="Request[EmployeeID]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="WhCd" Path="Request[WhCd]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="LOCNO" Path="Request[LOCNO]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="SupplierID" Path="Request[SupplierID]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="UseCondition" Path="Request[UseCondition]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="Depreciation" Path="Request[Depreciation]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="ScrapType" Path="Request[ScrapType]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="RepairType" Path="Request[RepairType]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="Status" Path="Request[Status]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="UserID" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> </ScalarCommand>

Command.Name: 分页查询
Command.Description: 本查询的结果值为JSON，参数路径为Results[检索分页].Json

Action.Command: <QueryCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="搜索结果" GroupName="固定资产" TableName="zc_Asset" CommandName="QueryPage"> <Parameter Name="BuyDateBegin" Path="Request[BuyDateBegin]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="BuyDateEnd" Path="Request[BuyDateEnd]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="BarCard" Path="Request[BarCard]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="AssetName" Path="Request[AssetName]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="CategoryID" Path="Request[CategoryID]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="AddType" Path="Request[AddType]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="CompanyID" Path="Request[CompanyID]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="DeptID" Path="Request[DeptID]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="EmployeeID" Path="Request[EmployeeID]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="WhCd" Path="Request[WhCd]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="LOCNO" Path="Request[LOCNO]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="SupplierID" Path="Request[SupplierID]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="UseCondition" Path="Request[UseCondition]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="Depreciation" Path="Request[Depreciation]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="ScrapType" Path="Request[ScrapType]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="RepairType" Path="Request[RepairType]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="Status" Path="Request[Status]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="Page" Path="Request[Page]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Rows" Path="Request[Rows]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="UserID" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> </QueryCommand>

Command.Name: 搜索结果
Command.Description: 返回搜索结果

Action.Command: <JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="application/json"> <Parameter Name="total" Path="Results[查询总数].Value" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="rows" Path="Results[分页查询].Items" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="HasError" Path="LastResult.IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="LastResult.ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>

Action.Name: Detail
Action.Title: 查看

Command.Name: 查询明细
Command.Description: 查询明细

Action.Command: <QueryCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="查看信息" GroupName="固定资产" TableName="zc_Asset" CommandName="GetDetail"> <Parameter Name="AssetID" Path="Request[ID]" Type="Parameter" /> </QueryCommand>

<RazorContentActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/xml" TemplateFile="\Asset\AssetDetail.cshtml" SettingType="EditDialog"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="LastResult.Item" Type="Parameter" /> </RazorContentActionCommand>

Command.Name: 查看页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command:
<EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="LastResult.Items" Type="Parameter" /> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog" DataBinding="Parameters[Data]" EditPanelClass="edit-panel-w3"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="公司" FieldType="TextBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="CompanyID" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Binding="CName" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="8" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="ID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetCompanyName" IsAutoHeight="false" OnSelect="function(rec){
var url='/Share/Query?name=GetDeptTreeByCompanyID&resultformat=jsontree&root='+rec.ID+'&pid=PID&id=ID&text=Name&CompanyID='+rec.ID;
var url1='/Share/Query?name=GetEmpByDeptAndJob&JobID=xxxxxx&DeptID=xxxxxx';
var url2='/Share/Query?name=GetWHByCompany&CompanyID='+rec.ID
$('#EmployeeID').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Department').combotree({url:url});
$('#EmployeeID').combobox({url:url1});
$('#WhCd').combobox({url:url2});
}" /> </Field> <Field Title="资产类别" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="CategoryID" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Binding="Category" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="6" /> </Field> <Field Title="增加方式" FieldType="TextBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="AddType" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Binding="AddType" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="Code" DataUrl="/Share/GetSystemCodes?code=C074" /> </Field> <Field Title="资产名称" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="AssetName" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Binding="AssetName" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="50" /> </Field> <Field Title="规格型号" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="SpecificationsModel" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Binding="SpecificationsModel" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="20" /> </Field> <Field Title="单位" FieldType="TextBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="UnitID" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Binding="UnitName" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="6" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="ID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetUnit" IsAutoHeight="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="条码编号" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="AssetID" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Binding="AssetID" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="20" /> </Field> <Field Title="使用部门" FieldType="TextBox"> <ComboTree Tag="input" ID="Department" Name="DeptID" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Binding="DName" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="8" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetDeptTreeByCompanyID&resultformat=jsontree&root=000000&pid=PID&id=ID&text=Name&CompanyID=xxxxxx" DisplayMember="text" ValueMember="id" IsAutoHeight="false" OnSelect="function(rec){
var url='/Share/Query?name=GetEmpByDeptAndJob&JobID=&DeptID='+rec.id;
$('#EmployeeID').combobox({url:url});
}" /> </Field> <Field Title="使用员工" FieldType="TextBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" ID="EmployeeID" Name="EmployeeID" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Binding="EName" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="8" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="ID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetEmpByDeptAndJob&DeptID=xxxxxx&JobID=xxxxxx" IsAutoHeight="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="仓库名称" FieldType="TextBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" ID="WhCd" Name="WhCd" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Binding="WHName" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="4" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="ID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetWHByCompany&CompanyID=XXXXXX" IsAutoHeight="false" OnSelect="function(rec){
var url='/Share/Query?name=GetLocByWH&WhCd='+rec.ID;
$('#LOCNO').combobox({url:url});
}" /> </Field> <Field Title="储位编号" FieldType="TextBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" ID="LOCNO" Name="LOCNO" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Binding="LOCNO" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="6" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="ID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetLocByWH&WhCd=W006" IsAutoHeight="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="条码编号" FieldType="Hidden"> <Input Tag="input" Name="BarCard" InputType="hidden" Binding="BarCard" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="20" IsHidden="true" /> </Field> <Field Title="购入价格" FieldType="NumberBox"> <NumericBox Tag="input" Name="Price" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:99999999.99" Binding="Price" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="购置日期" FieldType="TextBox"> <DateBox Tag="input" Name="BuyDate" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Binding="BuyDate" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="100" /> </Field> <Field Title="供应商" FieldType="TextBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="SupplierID" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Binding="SupplierName" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="8" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="ID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetAssetSupplier" /> </Field> <Field Title="质保说明" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="QualityDescription" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Binding="QualityDescription" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="200" /> </Field> <Field Title="使用年限" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="UseYear" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Binding="UseYear" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="50" /> </Field> <Field Title="使用情况" FieldType="TextBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="UseCondition" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Binding="UseCondition" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="10" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="Name" DataUrl="/Share/GetSystemCodes?code=C075" /> </Field> <Field Title="折旧方法" FieldType="TextBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="Depreciation" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Binding="Depreciation" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="50" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="Name" DataUrl="/Share/GetSystemCodes?code=C076" /> </Field> <Field Title="月折旧率" FieldType="NumberBox"> <NumericBox Tag="input" Name="Monatsquote" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:100" Binding="Monatsquote" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="月折旧额" FieldType="NumberBox"> <NumericBox Tag="input" Name="MonthDepreciation" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:99999999.99" Binding="MonthDepreciation" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="累计折旧" FieldType="NumberBox"> <NumericBox Tag="input" Name="AccumulatedDepreciation" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:99999999.99" Binding="AccumulatedDepreciation" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="净值" FieldType="NumberBox"> <NumericBox Tag="input" Name="NetAsset" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:99999999.99" Binding="NetAsset" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="报废类型" FieldType="TextBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="ScrapType" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Binding="ScrapType" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="Code" DataUrl="/Share/GetSystemCodes?code=C077" /> </Field> <Field Title="维修类型" FieldType="TextBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="RepairType" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Binding="RepairType" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="Code" DataUrl="/Share/GetSystemCodes?code=C078" /> </Field> <Field Title="状态" FieldType="Hidden"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Status" Class="edit-input" InputType="hidden" Binding="Status" IsEnable="false" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" IsHidden="true" /> </Field> <Field Title="备注" FieldType="TextArea"> <TextArea Tag="input" Name="Remark" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox " Style="width:704px" Binding="Remark" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="200" /> </Field> <Field> <Input Tag="input" Class="edit-input" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field> <Input Tag="input" Class="edit-input" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01101"> <Buttons> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-close" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="关闭" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>

Action.Name: Create
Action.Title: 新增

Command.Name: 新增页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command:
<EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html"> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog" EditPanelClass="edit-panel-w2"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="公司" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="CompanyID" Class="edit-input easyui-combobox" Options="editable:false,missingMessage:'请选择公司'" Binding="CompanyID" Length="8" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="ID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetAllAreaCode" IsAutoHeight="false" OnSelect="function(rec){
var url='/Share/Query?name=GetWHByCompany&CompanyID='+rec.ID
$('#WhCd').combobox({url:url});

Options="prompt:'0.00',precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:99999999.99" Binding="Price" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="购置日期" FieldType="DateBox"> <DateBox <Field Title="供应商" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="SupplierID" Class="easyui-combobox edit-input" Binding="SupplierID" IsRequired="false" Length="8" DisplayMember="Name"
